text: Publius Septimius Geta (7 March 189 â€“ 26 December 211) was son of Severus and reigned from 209211 AD. He was murdered by his cruel older brother Caracalla 2 years after when they were made co-emperors. Category:180s births Category:211 deaths Category:3rd-century Roman emperors
title: Geta (emperor)
